bug.summary: best.pt not saved when it is from the last epoch
bug.description:
Before submitting a bug report, please be aware that your issue must be reproducible with all of the following, otherwise it is non-actionable, and we can not help you:
Current repo: run git fetch && git status -uno to check and git pull to update repo Common dataset: coco.yaml or coco128.yaml Common environment: Colab, Google Cloud, or Docker image. See https://github.com/ultralytics/yolov5#reproduce-our-environment
If this is a custom dataset/training question you must include your train*.jpg, test*.jpg and results.png figures, or we can not help you. You can generate these with utils.plot_results(). <denchmark-h:h2>üêõ Bug</denchmark-h>
in train.py line: 390 ``` if (best_fitness == fi) and not final_epoch: ### torch.save(ckpt, best) del ckpt <denchmark-code>when the last epoch happens to have a best fitness, it wouldn't save a best.pt, the code outside the train.py cannot judge which .pt is the best.
## To Reproduce (REQUIRED)
train one epoch from an interrupted traning's last.pt , or the best result happens to be in the last epoch.
Output: "couldn't find best.pt" or load a wrong best.pt. (should be last.pt in this situation)
## Expected behavior A clear and concise description of what you expected to happen. when training compeletes, one can load best.pt as it is the best result.
## Environment If applicable, add screenshots to help explain your problem.
- OS: [e.g. Ubuntu] - GPU [e.g. 2080 Ti]
